version_description:
[Update Note]
● Add New 9 Song
● Add Season 5 and Probabilities increased
● Add App Letterbox Design
● Modifying step Effect bug
● A step bug has been fixed

1. Add 11 new songs!
* Mobile Original 2 song
* New Contest 2 song
* PIU XX Update Pre-released 3 song
* Add PIU Original Song 4 song

2. Add Season 8

3. Log-in events
- You will receive 300 gold shoes immediately upon access.

4. Return event!
- 500 Gold Shoes will be immediately available for access to disconnected users for more than 30 days.

5. System improvements and bug fixes
- Increased shoe acquisition and drop rate
- Add Level Up Rewards
- Correct the login reward image exposure bug
- Modifying some step bugs

[Pump It Up: Mobile Edition] September Update Guide

1. Add 11 new songs!
* K-POP 1 song
* Mobile Only 1 Song
* New Contest song 2 song
* Add PIU Original 7 Song

2. Showing the Shop of Season 1 to 8 songs!
- All season songs that could only be earned as bonus rewards will be released to the store.

3. Log-in Compensation (250 Gold Shoes)

4. System improvements and bug fixes
- Improved loading speed
- Add a batch download of unlocking songs
- Correcting the shoe usage achievement bug
- Correcting the login screen overlay when connected to the iPad
- Add iOS Logout Feature
- Modify Contest Song eyecatch (Ranked)
Extend attendance check reword period and change update info image

* Beat of the War 2 FullSong Bug Fix
* Change Terms and Conditions Domain Address
